dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.order.CustomerOrder
dataStructure.description:
A CustomerOrder is a communication used to procure a Product. There are different types of requests, such as AccessServiceRequests (ASRs), LocalServiceRequests (LSRs), DirectoryServiceRequests (DSRs), ProductOrders (PSRs).The abstract Order object provides a generalization of relationships.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerOrder

child.name: customerOrderType
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: customerOrderType

child.name: purchaseOrderNumber
child.description:
A number that uniquely identifies a CustomerOrder within the ordering Customer's enterprise.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: purchaseOrderNumber

child.name: assignedPriority
child.description:
The order's assigned priority after review.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: assignedPriority

child.name: assignedResponsibilityDate
child.description:
The target response date assigned after review.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: assignedResponsibilityDate

child.name: dueDate
child.description:
The date upon which the CustomerOrder is due for completion.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dueDate

child.name: customerOrderItem
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerOrderComprisedOf

This association end is optional
child.label: customerOrderItem

child.name: dunningCaseRule
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association DunningCaseRuleTriggersCustomerOrder

This association end is optional
child.label: dunningCaseRule
